item.title: Yesterday
item.description:
Show the drafts that you been working on yesterday. This helps you to track and process your yesterday’s pending work.

If you are using work systems like P.A.R.A, this workspace is really helpful.

Posted by @yacaFx

Install

item.title: Twitter
item.description:
Comprehensive Workspace for Composing Tweets. Twitter Workspace. Intended for use with Twitter Syntax and Twitter Action Group. More info and download links here.

Posted by Chris Grieser

item.title: Lists
item.description:
Show drafts with the tag “lists”.

Intended for use with the “Add to List” example action.

Posted by agiletortoise

Install

item.title: Templates
item.description:
Workspace to filter for only drafts with the “template” tag assigned.

For use with New Draft with Template example action. For more details, visit the forum tip on use of this action/workspace

Posted by agiletortoise

Install

item.title: > 7 Days Old
item.description:
Filter list to display only drafts which have not been modified in the last 7 days.

This workspace is an example of the use of date filters.

Posted by agiletortoise

Install

item.title: Today
item.description:
Show only drafts modified on the current date. Demonstrates the use of related date filters with Workspaces.

Posted by agiletortoise

Install

item.title: Tagged
item.description:
Filter for only drafts which have one or more tags assigned.

Posted by agiletortoise

Install

item.title: Untagged
item.description:
Filter for only drafts which have not been assigned a tag.

Posted by agiletortoise

Install
